featured.text: Why do the keepers at the sanctuary use recorded howls? (A) To prevent the howler monkeys from getting homesick.

definition.zh_def: 思鄉的；對家鄉感到懷念的
definition.en_def: Feeling a longing for one's home during a period of absence.
definition.example: After a month of traveling, she started to feel homesick.
